text: Donald Cortez "Don" Cornelius (September 27, 1936 - February 1, 2012) was an American television host and television producer. He was known for creating the music franchise series Soul Train. Cornelius was born in Chicago, Illinois. He was married to Delores Harrison until they divorced. He was later married to Viktoria Chapman from 2001 until they divorced. Cornelius committed suicide on February 1, 2012 in Sherman Oaks, California after shooting himself with a gun.McKinley Jr., James C. (February 1, 2012). "Don Cornelius, ‘Soul Train’ Creator, Is Dead". The New York Times. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2012 deaths Category:African-American people Category:American television producers Category:Television personalities from Chicago Category:Suicides by firearm
title: Don Cornelius
